CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISBLANK( Email )) , HYPERLINK("https://erp.xometry.com/quotes-orders?start=0&length=50&order%5B0%5D%5B%5D=4&order%5B0%5D%5B%5D=desc&search%5Bsearch%5D="+ SUBSTITUTE(Email, "@", "%40") +"&n_columns=20","Go to this Contact in the ERP", "_blank"), "No Email Provided on Contact")
CustomField.label: [dnu] ERP Contact Quotes/Orders
